title: Is it normal to feel somewhat depressed and empty after finishing a drama? - Quora

response.answer_text: Drama’s can certainly take up a huge amount of time and energy..I guess it would depend on your expectations of the outcome ? are you disappointed?, deflated? and what was it that you were avoiding by not wanting to address got you caught up in the drama.. invariably there are other hidden reasons.. Mostly people will do lots of things to avoid looking at a complicated situation they are being confronted with… or not!! We are amazing beings and really good a deceiving ourselves!! Just a different aspect of looking at it.. If it doesn’t fit with you ditch it!!
